text: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda
title: Grand Master

text: Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
author: Tony Stark
title: Former CEO

text: Find the leverage in the world so you can be truly lazy.
author: Larry Page
title: Co-Founder

text: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith
author: Steve Jobs
title: Co-Founder

text: Ngapain sekolah kalo udah bisa kerja
author: Rahman Fadhil
title: Software Engineer

text: Belajar tiap hari, karena bola adalah teman.
author: Adam Fadly
title: Software Engineer
